short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts Wowhead pages for quests, missions and NPCs into Warcraft Wiki markup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A productivity tool for use by Wowpedia editors, enabling them to create initial boilerplate wiki markup from Wowhead pages.

Currently supported are Wowhead pages on quests, missions, and NPCs.

When browsing a supported Wowhead page, the "W" toolbar icon will light up. Clicking it will present a popup with generated Wowpedia wiki markup, which can then be used to create a Wowpedia wiki article on that subject.
